recipesJson.name: Strawberry Ice Cream adaptation
recipesJson.author: Bob82FL
recipesJson.description:
This is adapted from Knucklebone's Strawberry Ice Cream Recipe.
Original Recipe:
Strawberry Ice Cream 
CAP Super Sweet 1.25%
CAP Sweet Strawberry 4.5%
CAP VBIC 3.5%
TFA DX Bravarian Cream 1.2%
TFA Vanilla Swirl Flavor 2.00%
FA Marshmallow 1%
